visualization.title: Motto
visualization.visState: {"title":"Motto","type":"markdown","params":{"markdown":"> **Ultimately, where you spend your money, time, and effort is your strategy, regardless of what you say** — _Harvard Business Review_"},"aggs":[],"listeners":{}}

visualization.title: Percentage spent of allocated budget (Timelion TEST)
visualization.visState: {"type":"timelion","title":"Percentage spent of allocated budget (Timelion TEST)","params":{"expression":".es(index=*entries, timefield=spent_on, metric='sum:hours').cusum().divide(.es(index=*entries, timefield=spent_on, metric='avg:mpsBudget'))","interval":"auto"}}

visualization.title: test timelion
visualization.visState: {"type":"timelion","title":"test timelion","params":{"expression":".es(index=*entries, timefield=spent_on, metric='sum:hours' ).mvavg(7).label('sum of hours').title('this is the title'), .es(index=*entries, timefield=spent_on, metric='sum:hours').mvavg(7).label('trend').trend('log', start=10, end=-10), .es(index=*entries, timefield=spent_on, metric='sum:hours', offset=-1y).mvavg(7).label('year before')","interval":"1w"}}

visualization.title: timelion test
visualization.visState: {"type":"timelion","title":"timelion test","params":{"expression":".es(index=*entries, timefield=spent_on, metric='sum:hours' ).mvavg(7).fit('average').label('sum of hours').title('this is the title'), .es(index=*entries, timefield=spent_on, metric='sum:hours').mvavg(7).label('trend').trend('log', start=10, end=-10), .es(index=*entries, timefield=spent_on, metric='sum:hours', offset=-1y).mvavg(7).fit('average').label('year before')","interval":"auto"}}
